summary: Lloyd George is mentioned in a cable (SILENCE C 201-730731) related to the KAPOK LCHARVEST operation in Mexico City. The cable also mentions Richard Walker and internal CIA staff. The other documents provided do not mention Lloyd George, but they provide context about CIA activities in Mexico City, including projects like LIFEAT and operations involving individuals like Liang Szu Cheng and Richard Walker. The documents span from 1962 to 1964, indicating a period of active CIA operations in Mexico City.
